description.displayText: Hortensia is hardworking, compassionate, and intelligent. She brought joy to the lives of the people who I know that she cared for: my close friend's Father, my sister's Mother in law, and my own Mother who she kindly pitched in to help whenever she could. Whoever receives her care will benefit greatly from her kindness and care. I am happy to offer a reference.
description.originalText: Hortensia is hardworking, compassionate, and intelligent. She brought joy to the lives of the people who I know that she cared for: my close friend's Father, my sister's Mother in law, and my own Mother who she kindly pitched in to help whenever she could. Whoever receives her care will benefit greatly from her kindness and care. I am happy to offer a reference.

description.displayText:
I cannot use enough superlatives for how great a caregiver Hortensia is. She took 24/7 care of my mother-in-law for 5+ years; she also helped out with my mother, my friend's mother, and before that, another friend's dad for years. She took better care of all of them than we (their children) could have done.
Quick list of words I often use to describe Hortensia as a caregiver:
amazing, smart, resourceful, reliable, dedicated, loving, caring, competent, responsible, respectful, attentive, patient, uncomplaining ... I'm sure I will think of more after I submit.
My MIL was in hospice 2x, and my mom was in rehab and later hospice. Every professional nurse, social worker, advisor who worked for the agencies told us that Hortensia is a GEM, and how fortunate we are to have her help. They were always confident  that the patient would get the best home care possible w/ Hortencia. Once Hortensia cares for someone you love, she is family for life. I cannot imagine not having her in our lives.
